name: Mission H.E.L.P
description:
Crash landed on an alien planet... Your only hope is to reach the top of the tower and signal for... H.E.L.P!

Keyboard Controls:

  • P = Restart Level
  • A/D = Move Left and Right
  • Spacebar = Jump
  • E = Interact
  • Q = Drop

(Xbox) Controller Controls:

  • Select = Restart Level
  • D-pad or Left Joystick = Move Left and Right
  • A Button = Jump
  • X Button = Interact
  • B Button = Drop

Credits:

Game Design and Programming: Lucas Evans
Art and Graphic Design: Fiona MacKinnon
Music and Sound: Alex Evans
